text: They welcomed their daughter Alana Martina four months ago, after a year of romance. And Cristiano Ronaldo and Georgina Rodriguez certainly looked more loved - up than ever on Tuesday, as they continued to enjoy their romantic winter getaway. Enjoying some alone time away from their parenting duties, the footballer, 33, and his 24 - year - old girlfriend explored caves in the holiday hot spot, before they cosied up for a sweet Instagram snap in a stunning outdoor pool. Say cheese!
